column3: ɔwo nye me Nyankopɔn; mubohuhor wo
column4: mibeyi wo dzin ayɛw; na ɔwo na ayɛ anwanwadze

column2: "Na ɔwo na ayɛ kurow no ndamfo; kurow a wɔbɔ ho ban ayɛ kurofo
column3: ananaben aban nnyɛ kurow bi; wɔronntow dabiarada."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi aman a wɔyɛ dzen bɛhyɛ wo enyimnyam
column3: amanaman a hɔn ho yɛ hu kurow no bosuro wo."
akoban ama ohianyi wɔ n'ahohia mu
column6: osiandɛ etsiɔdzemfo no ehuhuw tse dɛ ehum a ɔhwe fasu."

column2: "Ɔwo brɛɛ ananaben dedeedeyɛ no adze dɛ ɔhyew wɔ bea kwawee do; wɔbrɛɛ etsiɔdzemfo no adwontow adze dɛ ɔhyew wɔ nsuwusiw nwinwin ase."
"Bepɔw yi do na dɔm EWURADZE bɔto aman nyina pon: edziban a angoa wɔ mu
column5: wenyin a ɔagyen atɔ mu a wɔasɔn do krɔnn."

column2: "Na bepɔw yi do na ɔbɛsɛɛ akatado a ɔkata aman nyina do no enyim; na akataenyim a wɔatserɛw no amanaman nyina do no."
"Ɔamen owu daa; na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bɛpepa enyiwa nyina ho nyinsuwa; na oeyi ne man ahorohoraa efi asaase nyina do akɔ: na EWURADZE na ɔaka."
"Na wɔbɛka wɔ da no mu dɛ
column4: hɛn Nyankopɔn nye yi; yɛatweɔn no
column5: ama ɔaagye hɛn nkwa: EWURADZE nye yi; yɛatweɔn no
column6: hɛn enyi bɛgye na yeedzi ehurusi wɔ no nkwagye no mu."

column2: "Na bepɔw yi do na EWURADZE nsa bɛda
column3: na wobetsiatsia Moab do wɔ n'afamu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wotsiatsia nkyɛkyɛr do wɔ suminado."

column2: "Na ɔbɛtserɛw ne nsamu wɔ hɔn finimfin
column3: dɛ mbrɛ nyia ɔrobor tserɛw ne nsamu bor: na ɔbɛbrɛ no nkontompɔ no adze ɔnye ne nsaano edwin no nyina."
